channel.title: Silent Majority's Pirate Podcast
channel.description: This radio podcast will change the way you think ! This show is all about the underground, from music to digital media, your right to pirate and everything in-between! The most hardcore truth radio show on the internet!

item.title: Silent Majority's Pirate Podcast #153 (TV makes you stupid)
item.description: In this episode we talk about and prove why TV is noting more than a mind control device ! Also we call Hinez and ask why they put toxic chemicals in our Katsup! ------------------------- www.facebook.com/silentmajoritypunx www.twiiter.com/smpunx silentmajority@mindless.com www.cafepress.com/smshit

item.title: Silent Majority's Pirate Podcast # 151 (how to get endless free books!)
item.description: This episode we talk about how to get free books, how to screw over at&t and i call Crest Toothpaste and ask why the hell they put fluoride in something we put in our mouths ------------------------- Twitter: @smpunx facebook: www.facebook.com/silentmajoritypunx www.cafepress.com/smshit www.myspace.com/smrocks silentmajority@mindless.com

item.title: SMPP # 150 Were BACK !
item.description: This show we talk about the attack on free media choices and the relentless push by governments to get the population to accept being ripped off at both ends.
